capsules_submitted.utterance: Snape is indeed the title of the potions teacher at Hogwarts. I've had my fair share of dealings with him over the years, and let me tell you, he's a force to be reckoned with in that classroom. His expertise in potions is unmatched, but his teaching style can be quite... intimidating, to say the least.
